major: Both Recent Documents and Edit History panels visible at startup
Panels automatically close when hand tool is activated
minor: Recent Documents panel positioned on left (10px from left edge)
Edit History panel positioned on right (10px from right edge)
FloatingPanelManager now supports multiple simultaneous panels
Panel positioning independent for each panel type
patches: Modified showRecentDocsPanel() to use unique panel ID
Modified showEditHistoryPanel() to use unique panel ID
Added FloatingPanelManager.closeAll() call when hand tool activates
